metadata.Title: CVE-2018-3779 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: active-support ruby gem 5.2.0 could allow a remote attacker to executearbitrary code on the system, caused by containing a malicious backdoor. Anattacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on thesystem.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
